unnormalised: I remember feeling so lost after my exams. Anxiety was through the roof! A friend, Priya from IIT Delhi, suggested a meditation app. At first, I was skeptical, like something out of '3 Idiots' with Rancho's all-is-well mantra. But honestly, 10 minutes daily helped calm my Chintan. Now, I use it regularly. It's like having a little Shantivan in my pocket.
